title: Envoys of six nations present credentials to President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Sudath Silva) Six foreign envoys including five Ambassadors and a High Commissioner, presented their credentials to President Mahinda Rajapaksa at a ceremony which was held at the Presidential Secretariat today on 22 August. The envoys who presented their letters of credence were…
